name: Myth'O'lympics
description:
This game was made for Weekly Game Jam - Week 151, theme: Olympic Games About

Myth'O'lympics combines ancient olympic dyscypline and mythology to create unique experience.
You will practise javelin throw and learn, how to defeat the mighty Lernean Hydra .

Features
  • 3 difficulty modes
  • Mythological background
Controls A/DMove Left/RightMouseAimLeft Mouse ButtonThrow Javelin
